ComicInfo.Summary:
This is it. The fight you've all been waiting for. Helsing vs Draculas Daughter and only one will be leaving alive. Don't miss this action packed conclusion to the series brought to you by the fan-favorite creative team from Revenge of Wonderland, writer Raven Gregory and artist Allan Otero.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Ivan Nunes | 1 | | B | Cover B | Martin Coccolo & Mohan Sivakami | 2 | | C | Cover C | Nelly Jimenez | 3 | | D | Cover D | Allan Otero & Sebastian Cheng | 4 | | E | Cover E | Jason Metcalf & Ivan Nunes | 5 |
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allan Otero,Drew Johnson,Ivan Nunes,Jason Metcalf,Martin Coccolo,Mohan Sivakami,Nelly Jimenez,Sebastian Cheng
